titleStmt.title: Seldome comes the better: or, An admonition to all sorts of people, as husbands, wiues, masters, and seruants, &c. to auoid mutability, and to fix their minds on what they possesse. To the tuue [sic] of the He-deuill.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "You men that are well wiued ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcut illustrations at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
